description:
Directory of Clients of  Lobbyists; there are multiple records if there is more than one Lobbyist for a Client.  This list includes both current and past clients for each lobbyist.

Lobbyist clients are disclosed by lobbyists registered with the Ethics Commission on a monthly basis.  This dataset updates automatically every night.

name: Lobbyist Client Directory
